main event: Witnesses observed a circular object moving slowly in the sky in Bridgeport, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as circular like the bottom of a half moon., The object moved somewhat to the North, at about a 30-degree elevation., It was observed at tree top level, and the sighting lasted less than 60 seconds., The object made a whistling sound and emitted a bright white light., Three other witnesses confirmed seeing two additional objects traveling in formation.
witness description: the reporting witness and three other adult witnesses
